short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that lets you enter your current task and shows a random HD picture in the background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"SoloTasker is a productivity Chrome extension designed to help users stay focused on one task at a time. With a beautiful HD image background, users can enter their task and work distraction-free.

The extension provides a limited number of task changes per day and an option for paid customers to unlock unlimited task changes. Stay focused and improve your productivity with SoloTasker."
